I started heritrix without setting any memory heap size. So the
default max heap size that I see from web interface, console page is
64MB. But, top shows 28.8% of the 1GB memory used by the java process.
Web UI Console says heap size is 42MB and Used memory is 34MB. I am
some what confused as to how much memory this process is using? Any help?

Thanks,
Nachi
